name: SUPA Foundation
description: SUPA Foundation is an NFT based PVP-style Play-To-Earn game set in an alternate futuristic expansive metaverse. We will be launching our $SUPA token soon, followed by our NFTs. In the meantime, follow Supa Foundation's storyline on Discord and install the App to collect SupaFuel Tokens (later claimable in-game).
